page.title: 10Arbroath, Some views.
page.content: We interviewed several people in Arbroath about the town. About one third of the people we spoke to were holiday makers and said, Not sufficient road signs, I just love the sea front, the people were friendly, a good holiday resort because there are plenty of things for the children,eg, crazy golf,tennis golf; amusement arcade; baths; parks; miniature railway,fishing trips and a children's disco." Others who lived in Arbroath said ,"the new one way system is - chaos, waste of money, confusing, don't think much of it." The views about about our new supermarket were varied'' very handy,nice but not cheap,good parking.I don't think a lot of it, so-so , it depends,good". But the nicest thing was that both holiday makers and people who lived here would not really want to change it at all.
